Text: This is incomplete: there's no Rhythm Heaven :P

@squiglz13 if you want all the games as separate files you can get them individually from 'coolroms' (google it) 

This torrent was created just so people with similar tastes in games to mine wouldn't have to click download dozens and dozens of times :)
